name: fair-student-funding-budget-detail-2
title: Fair Student Funding Budget Detail 2
description:
Fair Student Funding Budget Detail FY 2015 - Part II This detail data contains one row for each school's data and calculations displayed on the Details screen starting from the "TOTAL FAIR STUDENT FUNDING WEIGHTED REGISTER AND FORMULA" to the bottom of the page.
Click Here for further information- http://schools.nyc.gov/offices/d_chanc_oper/budget/dbor/allocationmemo/fy14_15/Fair_School_Funding_FY2015.html
column_names: Label h: Foundation for New Schools
Total Column R: Register Dollar Change
Label d: Initial Fair Student Funding Allocations Total
Label a: FY14 Revised Based Allocations
Total Column N: FY14 Actual Registers
Label w: Final School FSF Percent
Label j: FY15 Fair Student Formula at 100%
Label t: Change to Preliminary Fair Student Funding Percentage Capped at 100%
Calculation j:  Initial Fair Student Funding Allocations Total
